00019 #ifndef YS_TEST_H
00020 #define YS_TEST_H
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include "ys_exception.h"
00024 #include <cmath>
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 int failure = 0;
00029 int success = 0;
00030 
00031 // close with tolerance TOLERANCE
00032 #define TOLERANCE 0.0000001
00033 #define VERIFY_FLOAT(a, b) { \
00034      if ( (abs(a - b) <= TOLERANCE ) ) \
00035      { cout << "Passed..." << __LINE__ << endl; success++; } \
00036      else \
00037      { cout << "Failed at " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << endl; failure++; } \
00038 }
00039      
00040 #define VERIFY(a,b) { \
00041     if ((a)==(b)) \
00042         { cout << "Passed..." << __LINE__ << endl; success++; } \
00043     else \
00044         { cout << "Failed at " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << endl; failure++; } \
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 #define VERIFY_THROW(a) { bool didThrow = false; \
00049     try { a; } \
00050     catch(YardException &e) \
00051         { \
00052             didThrow = true; \
00053             cout << e.what() << endl; \
00054         } \
00055         if (didThrow)   \
00056         { cout << "Passed..." << __LINE__ << endl; success++; } \
00057     else \
00058         { cout << "Failed at " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << endl; failure++; } \
00059 }
00060 
00061 #define VERIFY_NO_THROW(a) { bool didThrow = false; \
00062     try { a; } \
00063     catch(YardException &e) \
00064         { \
00065             didThrow = true; \
00066             cout << e.what() << endl; \
00067         } \
00068         if (!didThrow)   \
00069         { cout << "Passed..." << __LINE__ << endl; success++; } \
00070     else \
00071         { cout << "Failed at " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << endl; failure++; } \
00072 }
00073 
00074 #endif
